abstract.para:
This dataset contains occurrence data from the natural history collections and observation data managed by the National Museum of Natural History Luxembourg.
Due to a migration to a new IPT installation, the dataset was republished on January 19th 2022 as version 1.1. Before this, the dataset was published up to version 1.84 since its orignal registration in 2009.
As of late February 2022 data that was originally part of this dataset was transferred to other datasets here on GBIF to better document the origin of the occurrences. These datasets are, as of: - 2022/02/25 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/62e99340-528c-4baf-bbd7-bf0df2f186b9 - 2022/02/28 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/f7ad9609-d177-4f03-9cdb-0ab546c72226 - 2022/02/28 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/001fc3df-1ab4-4a5d-9531-ca62d2694238 - 2022/02/28 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/9ed0adc4-0a7a-49df-9054-e26e9a7dbc8d - 2022/02/28 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/72b86294-a50c-47da-a570-c34f653fbf92 - 2022/03/02 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/a1c9d4d7-aeda-46b6-a368-974b86d4f37c - 2022/03/02 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/c7d7f268-7e8c-4d5d-8f07-18dcff182bb2 - 2022/03/02 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/d1f3ab52-3223-4eb2-a2cd-f1c353defaeb - 2022/03/02 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/2715079c-e63a-4127-8cf1-39a56af1f6c4 - 2022/03/02 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/c9d089f6-7cf5-4204-9952-c8ac79da38de - 2022/03/02 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/7557f69d-22f8-4cd8-9168-16d60f7170fd - 2022/03/02 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/c9198eaf-f909-4502-9bcd-4e83452fb245 - 2022/03/04 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/32651421-c517-48a3-a80c-cb2d866ea1f6 - 2022/03/04 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/b109feb0-90f6-4c38-92b3-9008ce60a6f8 - 2022/03/04 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/2ad7cdd7-49ed-493d-9ae7-541c83caafcf - 2022/06/16 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/9fb39c60-52ab-460f-ade5-a8a204d65434 - 2022/06/16 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/ca89af9a-72f6-426e-8f03-019eb91de8f7 - 2022/06/21 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/85b69bca-2234-4877-bb13-cef1f32fd9c3 - 2022/06/21 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/d70c169f-fd9e-4355-8431-8d1fba91370f - 2022/06/21 : https://www.gbif.org/dataset/b6dc7422-a09d-4986-b5ac-e8f6f50a9732

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.
